article_title: Newton County Shooting Suspect Officially Charged
article_text:
The Newton County Sheriff's Department has officially charged a man accused of fatally shooting a man on Thursday.

Newton County Sheriff Jackie Knight says Ryan Evans of Carthage, Miss. is charged with fatally shooting Guy Durand Loper on Good Hope Road in Newton County on Thursday evening.

Knight says Evans remains in custody in Newton County and is facing a $1 million bond.

article_metadata.description: A man arrested in connection with a fatal shooting has now been formally charged.
article_metadata.author: Aaron Morrison
